photos.question: What kind of photos do I need to upload?
photos.answer: Make variety a priority. Varied facial expressions and varied backgrounds, taken at various times of the day, are the keys to high quality input photos. Oh, and minimal makeup and accessories, please!

usage.question: What do you do with my uploaded photos?
usage.answer: The photos you upload are used to train our AI model so it can create realistic AI headshots. These input photos are deleted within 7 days, but you can instantly delete them at any time with our 'Delete' button.
